name: Luck Out
description:
Are you feeling Lucky today?
Find out your today's Luck Percentage and Lucky Number!

A simple yet addictive game based on luck , tactic and more luck!

SIMPLE GAMEPLAY
Pick 1 from 3 random cards!

GOOD CARDS
Earn coins, lives and powerups!

BAD CARDS
KNIFE: take away your life
BOMB: blow up all your winnings!

ADDICTIVE QUICK GAMES
Depend on your luck, each game lasts 10 seconds to 10minutes!
6 PowerUps to boost your luck!
Compete with friends on Game Center!

FREE to play!
